name: Manual required - architecture change
description: Request requiring significant architectural changes should not be auto-fixed

input.title: Add async/streaming support for large PDF processing
input.body:
## Feature Request

For very large PDFs (100+ MB), we need streaming/async processing support to avoid memory issues.

## Proposal
- Add async variants of all processing methods
- Implement streaming page-by-page processing
- Add progress callbacks
- Support cancellation

## Use Case
Processing large document archives where memory is limited.
